actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide for a 7-percent cost-of-living increase in social security benefits, effective immediately.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that the special seven percent cost-of-living increase in social security benefits provided in Public Law 93-66 shall become effective immediately.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a 7-percent cost-of-living increase in social security benefits, effective immediately.
